lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In addition to requesting a guarantee of borrower stock, Beesley is expected tomorrow to endorse the creation of a secondary market, called "Aggie-mae" by some proponents, for the resale of farm real estate loans.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Yesterday, Jim Billington, a member of the Farm Credit Administration board which regulates the system, said Congress should plan to spend at least 800 mln dlrs beginning late this year to bail-out the system.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: James McClure, R-Idaho, has drafted a resolution which would put the Senate on record as guaranteeing the value of farm credit system stock.

lst.name: sentence
